name: EntityStruckByLightningEvent
description: EntityStruckByLightningEvent is fired when an Entity is about to be struck by lightening. This event is fired whenever an EntityLightningBolt is updated to strike an Entity in EntityLightningBolt#onUpdate() via ForgeEventFactory#onEntityStruckByLightning(Entity, EntityLightningBolt) . lightning contains the instance of EntityLightningBolt attempting to strike an entity. This event is Cancelable . If this event is canceled, the Entity is not struck by the lightening. This event does not have a result. HasResult This event is fired on the MinecraftForge#EVENT_BUS .
